description: From Ancient Greek μισογυνία (misogunía) and μισογύνης (misogúnēs, “woman hater”), from μισέω (miséō, “I hate”) + γυνή (gunḗ, “woman”); synchronically, miso- +‎ -gyny.

entries.meaning: Hatred of, contempt for, or prejudice against women.
examples: […]  a lonely straight male had no equivalently forgiving Theory of Masculinism to help him out of this bind, this key to all misogynies:  […]
